```{r}

install.packages("readODS")

# Paket aktivieren
library("readODS")

# ods-Datei ".ods" importieren
daten_ods <- read_ods("daten/raw/ts-x-15.02.04.04_detail-APPENDIX.ods", sheet = "period":"sex", range = "D1:D26")
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = daten_in,
       mapping = aes(x = "sex",
                     y = "period") +
         geom_bar())
```
